messages.title: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION:
messages.content: Strong, stable leadership in the national interest or a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn

messages.title: GENERAL ELECTION: THURSDAY 8th JUNE
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership for the best possible deal from Brexit and a growing economy to secure our future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet argues for the best Brexit deal possible and stresses the need for strong leadership to secure that deal.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests that a vote for the candidate is a vote to avoid chaos and to ensure strong and stable leadership.

issues.brexitEurope: The leaflet emphasizes the importance of securing the best possible Brexit deal and strong leadership through Brexit and beyond.

leaflet.personalStatement: Getting on with the job and making Brexit work is vital.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Daisy Pick, on behalf of Michael Ellis, both of 78 St George's Avenue, Northampton NN2 6JF. Printed by J&S Print Ltd, 92 Lower Parliament Street, Nottingham, Nottinghamshire NG1 1EH

images.caption: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION: STRONG, STABLE LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST or A COALITION OF CHAOS WITH JEREMY CORBYN
GENERAL ELECTION: THURSDAY 8th JUNE STRONG AND STABLE LEADERSHIP THE BEST POSSIBLE DEAL FROM BREXIT A GROWING ECONOMY TO SECURE OUR FUTURE
